name: A Part
description:
A short isometric puzzle platformer, created in one month for Ludum Dare's October Challenge 2015. My first released game.

This has only been tested on Windows 7 and later.

I may take this game further, in which case you will of course get updates if you buy it now.

Follow me on twitter:

@perturbgames

Please note this game will require a relatively recent graphics card, which supports multiple render targets, and at least shader model 4.1
